## How to share a course to instructional design team?

Tina is a course administrator in an organisation and she wants to share a
training course to her colleagues.

Let’s see how Tina will share a course with colleagues.

1\. In Curricula, Tina clicks **Course** on the navigation pane.

2\. She finds the course she wants to share, clicks the More actions button on
the course card, and then clicks **Share**. She can also click the course card
and then click the Share button on the top right corner of the **Course
details** page.

3\. In the **Share course** panel, Tina selects users with whom she wants to
share the course from address book.

4\. In the **Comments** section, she can enter comments as the email body.

5\. When she finishes adding users and comments, she clicks **Save**. An email
notification about course sharing will be sent to the shared users.
